name: Liberty Mutual Insurance Company
summary: Liberty Mutual Insurance Company is a Boston-based mutual insurer and one of the world’s largest property and casualty insurance providers, offering a wide range of personal and commercial insurance products. Founded in 1912, it operates globally in 29 countries and is ranked 87th on the 2024 Fortune 100 list, employing over 40,000 people worldwide. As a mutual company, it is owned by its policyholders rather than public shareholders.
